name: WPW-Linkslist
author: Sunburntkamel

sections.description:
This widget replaces the standard Blogroll widget, and adds the following features:

  • API compatibility, so the widget matches the theme
  • Respects options set in the Links Manager Admin Panel
sections.installation:
This is a widget, and as such requires the widgets plugin from http://automattic.com/code/widgets

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag “Links List” widget to your sidebar where you would like it to appear
sections.faq:
Does this widget work with WordPress 2.1 and above?

No, the widget plugin contains an API compliant widget for wordpress 2.1 and above.

The WordPress standard widget still doesn’t display my links the way I want, will WPW-Linkslist ever support 2.1?

Someday, when I have the free time

What if i want my links to be something other than a list?

I’m working on that. see #2.

short_description: A flexible replacement for the standard links widget, for wordpress 2.0.x only.
description:
This widget replaces the standard Blogroll widget, and adds the following features:
